p: Feed ingredients, nutrient composition of concentrate and roughages are shown in Table 1. Concentrates were formulated and mixed using local feed ingredients to contain 14.1% CP. Rice straw has a lower CP (2.8%) and higher NDF and ADF content (75.8% and 46.8%, respectively). The SG has a greater content of CP and NFC contents (14.7% and 15.2%, respectively) while it has a lower content of NDF and ADF concentration (55.7% and 33.1%, respectively). In addition, SG contains high level of NFC (15.2%).
